00048   inline DFLib::XY::Report::Report(const vector<double> &theLocation,
00049                                    const double &Bearing,const double &std_dev,
00050                                    const string &theName)
00051     : receiverLocation(theLocation),
00052       bearing(Bearing*M_PI/180.0),
00053       sigma(std_dev*M_PI/180.0)
00054   {
00055     setReportName(theName);
00056     // Make sure our bearing is *always* 0<bearing<2pi.  If it isn't,
00057     // reset it:
00058     while (bearing < 0)
00059       bearing += 2*M_PI;
00060   }        
00061 
00062   inline DFLib::XY::Report::~Report()
00063   {
00064   }
00065 
00066   inline double DFLib::XY::Report::getReportBearingRadians() const
00067   {
00068     // bearing *must* be in 0<bearing<2*pi
00069     return bearing;
00070   }
00071   inline double DFLib::XY::Report::getBearing() const
00072   {
00073     // always return bearing in range 0-360 degrees
00074     return (getReportBearingRadians()*180.0/M_PI);
00075   }
00076 
00077   inline double DFLib::XY::Report::getBearingStandardDeviationRadians() const
00078   {
00079     return sigma;
00080   }
00081   inline double DFLib::XY::Report::getSigma() const
00082   {
00083     return sigma*180/M_PI;
00084   }
00085 
00086   inline void DFLib::XY::Report::setReceiverLocation(vector<double> &theLocation)
00087   {
00088     receiverLocation.setXY(theLocation);
00089   }
00090 
00091   inline const vector<double> & DFLib::XY::Report::getReceiverLocation() 
00092   { 
00093     return receiverLocation.getXY();
00094   }
00095 
00096   inline void DFLib::XY::Report::setBearing(double Bearing)
00097   {
00098     // bearing *must* be in 0<bearing<2*pi
00099     bearing=Bearing*M_PI/180.0;
00100     while (bearing < 0)
00101       bearing += 2*M_PI;
00102   }
00103   inline void DFLib::XY::Report::setSigma(double Sigma)
00104   {
00105     sigma=Sigma*M_PI/180;
00106   }
